description: Try our easy to follow Shepherd's Pie Parcels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Shepherd's Pie Parcels Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 sheet frozen reduced-fat puff pastry, just thawed
475g classic mash, stirred until smooth (not heated)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook onion and carrot, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add mince and oregano. Cook, breaking up with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until browned.

Add tomato paste and sauce. Cook, stirring, for 30 seconds. Add flour and stir to combine. Add 1/2 cup water and bring to the boil. Stir in peas. Cook for 2 minutes or until sauce thickens. Set aside to cool.
Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.

Cut each pastry sheet in half to form 8 rectangles. Trim length to 20cm. Place 4 rectangles on prepared trays. Top with cheese, mash and mince mixture. Cover with remaining pastry rectangles. Using a fork, press edges together to seal. Trim edges if needed.
Brush pastry parcels with egg. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve with tomato sauce, if desired (see tip).
